# RegularExpressionHelper.IsValidIpAddress method

Determines whether *value* is valid ip address.

```csharp
public static bool IsValidIpAddress(string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Ip address to check. |

## Return Value

true if ip address is valid; otherwise, false.
